SEARCH

All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
com.method5.jot.crypto
Provides cryptographic utilities for key generation, signing, and signature verification.
com.method5.jot.entity
Contains core domain entities used throughout the Jot SDK, such as account identifiers, addresses, and network types.
com.method5.jot.entity.metadata
Metadata-specific extensions of core entities, such as types and fields derived from the Substrate runtime metadata.
com.method5.jot.entity.variant
Describes runtime variant definitions for enum-like types used in Substrate metadata and SCALE decoding.
com.method5.jot.events
Provides core types and utilities for handling Substrate runtime events.
com.method5.jot.extrinsic
Constructs and represents Substrate extrinsics including payloads, versions, signatures, and encoding logic.
com.method5.jot.extrinsic.call
Provides strongly typed helper methods for constructing known extrinsic calls, such as balances.transfer or multisig.asMulti.
com.method5.jot.extrinsic.model
Internal data models used to represent parts of extrinsics such as call arguments, metadata references, and call indices.
com.method5.jot.metadata
Handles decoding and traversal of Substrate runtime metadata (v14+), including type lookup, pallet extraction, and call matching.
com.method5.jot.query
Provides high-level query helpers for accessing on-chain state using the Substrate storage key system.
com.method5.jot.query.model
Internal models and data structures for representing storage query results, such as balances or account info.
com.method5.jot.rpc
Abstractions and helpers for working with Substrate JSON-RPC methods, including system, state, author, and chain RPCs.
com.method5.jot.scale
SCALE codec implementation for encoding and decoding Substrate-compatible binary data.
com.method5.jot.signing
Handles transaction payload signing using sr25519 and ed25519, including payload encoding, signature appending, and signer abstraction.
com.method5.jot.spec
Helper methods and functions related to node chain specifications.
com.method5.jot.util
General-purpose utility functions used across the SDK, such as byte array manipulation and hex encoding.
com.method5.jot.wallet
High-level wallet abstraction supporting key management, persistent storage, and address generation for SS58 accounts.
